item.description: Sadlil’s I am currently Migrating my site to HUGO. Original Site will Be available Soon. In few word I am - Full time Software Engineer, Hobbyist Photographer. Loves to solves problems. Egar to learn new Technologies and plays with them. Loves to read and travel. - Knows How to write code in - Go, C, C++, Java, PHP, JavaScript. - For Frameworks knows - Laravel 5, Spring 3, Grails. Worked with Hibernate.

item.title: Experiences
item.description: Software Engineer, Backend Grab, Singapore. Dec 2017 â€“ Present Full Time Go gRPC MySQL PgSql Presto Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing and mobile payments app in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and logistics across a region of more than 620 million people. Working with governments, drivers, passengers, and charities, we aim to unlock the true potential of the region by solving problems that hinder progress.

item.title: Achievements
item.description: 2017 Joined Grab as a Software Engineer Moved to Singapore Contributed In kubernetes/helm - Expose tiller server metrics to prometheus Contributed in Kubernetes - Resolved Reverse DNS records for named headless services - Use updated DNS in cluster Building Voyager - Secure Kubernetes Ingress Controller by AppsCode - Github Link Became Collaborator of go-gearman - Thread safe Job Creating 2016 Participated in my 5th ICPC Dhaka Regional
